item.title: Ashleigh add a quote by Tupac Shakur
item.description: "I don’t see myself being special; I just see myself having more responsibilities than the next man. People look to me to do things for them, to have answers." -- Tupac Shakur

item.title: Ashleigh add a quote by Tupac Shakur
item.description: "All I’m trying to do is survive and make good out of the dirty, nasty, unbelievable lifestyle that they gave me." -- Tupac Shakur

item.title: Ashleigh add a quote by Tupac Shakur
item.description: "No matter what these people say about me, my music doesn't glorify any image. My music is spiritual when you listen to it. It's all about emotion, I tell my innermost, darkest secrets." -- Tupac Shakur

item.title: Ashleigh add a quote by Bernard M. Baruch
item.description: "Be who you are and say what you feel, because those who mind don't matter, and those who matter don't mind." -- Bernard M. Baruch

item.title: Ashleigh add a quote by William W. Purkey
item.description: "You've gotta dance like there's nobody watching, Love like you'll never be hurt, Sing like there's nobody listening, And live like it's heaven on earth." -- William W. Purkey

item.title: Ashleigh add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "If you tell the truth, you don't have to remember anything." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Ashleigh add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "Don't cry because it's over, smile because it happened." -- Dr. Seuss
